downloadTitle: Control the health of Windows 10-based devices
downloadDescription: This white paper details an end-to-end solution helping to protect high-value assets by enforcing, controlling, and reporting the health of devices running Windows 10.

downloadFile.name: Control the health of Windows 10-based devices - v1.3.DOCX
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/c/9/fc97e83b-a20d-4be2-97c2-194c21263018/Control the health of Windows 10-based devices - v1.3.DOCX

detailsSection:
Windows 10 is a major step towards an end-to-end secure solution that doesn’t focus only on implementing preventive security defenses. Windows 10 adds device health attestation capabilities enforced by hardware.
It’s a key feature for enabling Conditional Access Control.
detailsSection_file_name: Control the health of Windows 10-based devices - v1.3.DOCX
systemRequirementsSection: The file is a Microsoft Word document.
installInstructionSection: Users who do not have Microsoft Word can download the Word Viewer from the Microsoft Download Center.
